code: import{GET_EDUCATION_BY_USER,GET_ALL_COMPETENCY,GET_ACHIEVEMENT_BY_USER,GET_All_ORAGNIZATION,GET_ACHIEVEMENT_BY_ID,GET_RECOMMENDATION_BY_USER,GET_ACHIEVEMENT_DATA}from'../types';import theRapidHireApiService from'../../api/apiService';export var actionGetAllEducation=function actionGetAllEducation(userId){var request=theRapidHireApiService('getAllEducation',{userId:userId});return{type:GET_EDUCATION_BY_USER,payload:request};};export var actionGetAllCompetency=function actionGetAllCompetency(){var request=theRapidHireApiService('getAllCompetency');return{payload:request,type:GET_ALL_COMPETENCY};};export var actionGetAchievementsByUser=function actionGetAchievementsByUser(userId){var request=theRapidHireApiService('listAchievementByUser',{userId:userId});return{payload:request,type:GET_ACHIEVEMENT_BY_USER};};export var actionGetAchievementsData=function actionGetAchievementsData(userId){var request=theRapidHireApiService('listAchievementByUser1',{userId:userId});return{payload:request,type:GET_ACHIEVEMENT_DATA};};export var actionListOragnization=function actionListOragnization(){var request=theRapidHireApiService('ListOragnization');return{payload:request,type:GET_All_ORAGNIZATION};};export var actionGetRecommendationsByUser=function actionGetRecommendationsByUser(userId){var request=theRapidHireApiService('listRecommendationByUser',{userId:userId});return{payload:request,type:GET_RECOMMENDATION_BY_USER};};
